body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good afternoon! My name is Willie Gray and I'm with Premier Mini Golf Adventures. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Alexis! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm really excited about visiting your mini golf course soon, but I've heard about some security issues you've had recently. Can you tell me more about that?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Alexis. We take the security of our guests very seriously. Could I get your email address to send you detailed information and updates about our security measures?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Alexis. And for verification purposes, could you also provide the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I've noted that down. We've recently upgraded our security systems and increased patrols around the course, especially in the evening hours. I'll send you a detailed email about all the measures we've implemented.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Alexis! It's our top priority to ensure all our guests have a safe and enjoyable experience. Thank you for bringing up your concern. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a fantastic day!
